name: Don't Walk: FOOTBALL!
description:
Don't Walk, FOOTBALL! is an experimental game built to test the limits of the character controller in our Dare To Be Digital 2014 game, Don't Walk: RUN!

The game is played 2v2, but has been intentionally left open in its playstyle to encourage emergent gameplay solutions!

CONTROLS: 

XBOX PAD (UP TO 4)

Left Joystick: Move

A: Jump

LB: Dashing Sprint

RB: Kick Ball/Player

KEYBOARD1

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Q: Dashing Sprint

E: Kick Ball/Player

KEYBOARD2

Arrow Keys: Move

RShift: Jump

/: Dashing Sprint

Enter: Kick Ball/Player

HOW TO PLAY

Press your corresponding 'jump' button to activate your player. Now, invent your own football game rules and go!

The game is currently only designed for 4 players.
